Name: Poison
Description: Ugly goo, flowing through the veins. Slowly drains strength.

Name: Power UP
Description: Focusing helps you hit much more effectively.

Name: Guard
Description: Being vigilant is one of the components of invulnerability.

Name: Shield
Description: With a good stance and a block, everything is on the shoulder.

Name: Berserk
Description: No one knows what leads him into endless battles.
